trans-unit.source: Contains event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"></xref> event and the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Contém dados de evento para o <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"> </xref> evento e o <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> instance is shut down or unloaded, an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> event or an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> event is raised, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.AppDomain>instância for desligada ou descarregada, um <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown>evento ou um <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded>é gerado, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: The BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs object stores the reason for the shutdown or unload and is passed to the event handler as one of its parameters.
trans-unit.target: O objeto BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs armazena o motivo do desligamento ou descarregar e é passado para o manipulador de eventos como um de seus parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> with the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property set to `reason`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>com o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A>propriedade definida como `reason`.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The reason for the hosted application domain shutdown.
trans-unit.target: O motivo do desligamento do domínio de aplicativo hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason the hosted application domain was shut down.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o motivo pelo qual que o domínio de aplicativo hospedado foi desligado.

trans-unit.source: The Reason property stores an <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> object as its value that describes why the <xref:System.AppDomain> instance was shut down.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade motivo armazena uma <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>objeto como seu valor que descreve por que o <xref:System.AppDomain>instância foi desligada.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>
